sqlMap.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(C.DEFAULT_VALUE) FROM UR_USERGOODS_INFO A, PD_GOODSPRC_DICT B, PD_GOODSPRCATTR_DICT C WHERE A.ID_NO = (SELECT ID_NO FROM UR_USER_INFO WHERE PHONE_NO = #PHONE_NO#) AND A.PRC_ID = B.PRC_ID AND A.PRC_ID = C.PRC_ID AND B.PRC_CLASS = 'YnKD10' AND B.PRC_TYPE = '0' AND C.ATTR_ID = '23M018' AND A.EXP_DATE > SYSDATE AND A.EFF_DATE < SYSDATE
SELECT DEFAULT_VALUE FROM PD_GOODSPRCATTR_DICT WHERE PRC_ID = #PRC_ID# AND ATTR_ID = #ATTR_ID#
